about_the_game:
Welcome to DFUSE


DFUSE is a gripping, first-person shooter that plunges you into a world of intense team-based combat. As a neutral agent, you'll join forces with your squad, each member playing to their strengths, to dominate the battle.

Coordinate your tactics, deploy your unique utilities, and secure strategic sites in the race to plant or disarm the deadly Catalyst. Level up as a team, climb the leaderboards, and master the ever-evolving maps.

But beware: the enemy is relentless, adapting their strategies and wielding a similar arsenal of deadly weapons. Only through unwavering teamwork, communication, and strategic brilliance can you emerge victorious.

Are you ready to break free from the monotony of solo dominance and experience the thrill of true team-based combat? Join the fight and become a legend in DFUSE.

LORE


Beneath the surface lies a hidden power structure: the Prime Coalition. This secretive organization, governed by a council of six factions, controls the most vital resources in the underworld.

The Prime Coalition maintains order and distributes resources through its absolute control over the executive, legislative, and judicial branches. As the sole military force and monetary authority, the Prime Coalition wields immense power.

The underworld's resources are scarce and highly contested, leading to a constant struggle for dominance. While open warfare between factions is forbidden, covert operations and espionage are commonplace. Agents are recruited to infiltrate enemy territory, capture strategic resource points, and sabotage rival factions.

As a Neutral Agent, you play a crucial role in this shadowy world. Your mission is to navigate the treacherous landscape, outsmart your opponents, and secure vital resources for your chosen faction. Remember, while victory is important, preserving the integrity of the map is equally crucial. Use tactics that minimize destruction and avoid leaving a trail of devastation in your wake.

FACTIONS


The Goldcrest Families are the pinnacle of wealth and power within the Prime Coalition. As the custodians of gold, they control the very currency that fuels the organization. Their influence extends beyond finance, as they also oversee the production of luxury goods and the minting of gold coins.

The Underbelly is a shadowy faction that operates from the fringes of society. Disguised as homeless people, they leverage their marginalized status to gather intelligence and control the flow of datashards within the Prime Coalition.

Aegis Arms is a formidable faction within the Prime Coalition, renowned for its control over metal and its ownership of the largest weapons factories. They are committed to technological innovation, constantly developing new weapons and enhancing their arsenal. This aggressive expansionist stance has often drawn criticism from other factions.

NeuraPharm is a dominant force within the Prime Coalition as they supplies essential medicines to both the Coalition's military and civilian population, ensuring access to vital healthcare. However, beneath this humanitarian facade lies a darker side. NeuraPharm secretly develops and distributes illegal drugs, often in collaboration with the Underbelly.

Weave Dynamics is a relatively new faction within the Prime Coalition, but it has quickly risen to prominence due to its control over the valuable resource of synthetic fiber. As a leading supplier of this essential material to the Coalition's military, Weave Dynamics plays a vital role in enhancing the underworld's defense capabilities.

While publicly known as a technology company involved in telecommunications and computer components, DataForge Technologies operates as a secretive faction with far-reaching influence. Their control over silicon is essential to the Coalition's technological advancements. The faction's expertise in microchip production ensures a steady supply of this critical resource, powering everything from military equipment to civilian infrastructure.

UTILITIES & GRENADES


In DFUSE you will have the opportunity to access various utilities and grenades that unlock based on your affiliation with factions and the role you decide to play in your team.
Here are some examples of these you can use - we are continuously adding to this list:

Incendiary Grenade: Creates a burning area that damages enemies and obstructs vision.

Flash Grenade: Temporarily blinds and disorients enemies with a bright flash and loud bang.

Smoke Grenade: Releases a thick cloud of smoke that obscures vision.

Motion Sensor: Detects and reveals enemy movement within a 3 meters radius.

Landmine: Concealed explosive device that triggers upon enemy contact.

Satellite Strike: A powerful laser beam that can be called down from orbit.

PARABELLUM - PLAYER-DRIVEN PROGRESSION AND COMMUNITY INFLUENCE


In DFUSE players influence the game through factions. Factions aren't just for show; they're powerful groups competing for control. Pick a faction, complete contracts, and help your faction grow stronger.

How it Works:

Choose Your Side: Pick one of the six unique factions.

Earn Rewards: Complete missions and win battles to earn points for your faction.

Influence the Game: The more points your faction earns, the more you can change the game.

Vote on Changes: Help decide new features, game modes, and more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later 64-bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen R5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD storage is recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later 64-bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD storage is recommended

short_description: A groundbreaking game of teamwork. Tired of being forced into teams without the proper tools? DFUSE's unique synergy system empowers players to fight to their strengths, not only their aim. Play your role, master your weapons, and lead your team to victory. Every action counts. Every player matters.
